text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: start; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 15px; line-height: normal; font-family: Georgia; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: Consider the absolute value function defined by f(x)= |x| .
By using the definition of absolute value f can be expressed as a piecewise-defined function

text.tspan: The graph of this function is V-shaped and consists of two linear pieces, and joined at the origin,
as shown in the figure above.
